item.description:
Jim Plunket has been playing guitar for the past 20 years around the New England area. Those of us who have gone to college in the New England area are very familiar with him. He plays the songs that everyone loves and knows by heart, and get's people to sing a long... real loud and with good cheer. Every time I have seen him in the past it's always been a blast!

Join us for a fun, lively, and entertaining evening on Boston Harbor.

* YOU NEEED TO BUY YOUR TICKET IN ADVANCE *
** Tickets are $20.00 **

Jim Plunkett's Website:
http://www.jimplunket...

http://www.baystatecr...

Cruise leaves from The World Trade Center Pier,
Seaport Blvd,
Boston, MA

Directions to the pier:
http://www.baystatecr...

We'll meet at 6:30pm (at least we'll aim for that)

We can begin boarding at 7:00pm. Music starts at 8:00pm and goes until 11:00pm

FOR TICKETS:
To purchase your ticket for the cruise go to this website, enter the number of tickets you want to purchase and click "GO"

http://www.baystatecr...

Information about Baystate Cruiseline:
Music Cruises are limited to Adults 21 or more years of age. All Music Cruises begin and end at our Boston Docks.
item.name: Music & Boston Harbor Cruise w/ Jim Plunkett
